posts.name: Johannes Wolf
posts.cooked:
You can hide it by setting the stroke thickness to 0:

set-style(axes: (y: (stroke: 0pt)))

Setting stroke: none does not work for some reason (bug).
posts.raw:
You can hide it by setting the stroke thickness to 0:
```
set-style(axes: (y: (stroke: 0pt)))
```

Setting `stroke: none` does not work for some reason (bug).

posts.cooked: But why are you also setting the black color?
posts.raw: But why are you also setting the black color?
